line_1: Full many a watchful hour shall number,
line_2: Or envy those who early slumber.

line_1: Thus he wastes half his Days, and his Hours without Number;
line_2: "A little more Sleep, and a little more Slumber;"
HUSH! my dear, lie still and slumber,

line_1: And own they're more than she can number.
line_2: Count o'er your virtues by the hunder,
